trans-unit.source: A warning is now raised when the number of input data items passed to the simulator does not match the number of input nodes, to help avoid unintentionally passing data to the wrong input node. This warning can be avoided by passing data for all nodes, or using the dictionary input style if you want to only pass data for a specific node. (#139)
trans-unit.target: A warning is now raised when the number of input data items passed to the simulator does not match the number of input nodes, to help avoid unintentionally passing data to the wrong input node. This warning can be avoided by passing data for all nodes, or using the dictionary input style if you want to only pass data for a specific node. (#139)

trans-unit.target: 如果激活类型被传递给了

trans-unit.source: Added documentation on the various NengoDL config options.
trans-unit.target: Added documentation on the various NengoDL config options.

trans-unit.source: Added keep_history config option, which can be set to
trans-unit.target: Added keep_history config option, which can be set to

trans-unit.source: Added documentation on saving and loading model parameters.
trans-unit.target: Added documentation on saving and loading model parameters.

trans-unit.source: Added TensorFlow implementation for general linear synapses
trans-unit.target: 添加了针对一般线性突触的TensorFlow实现。

trans-unit.source: Added a new example demonstrating how to integrate a Keras model with NengoDL (thanks to new contributor @NickleDave).
trans-unit.target: Added a new example demonstrating how to integrate a Keras model with NengoDL (thanks to new contributor @NickleDave).

trans-unit.source: Added a new example demonstrating how to use the NengoDL Converter to convert a Keras model to a spiking Nengo network. (#141)
trans-unit.target: Added a new example demonstrating how to use the NengoDL Converter to convert a Keras model to a spiking Nengo network. (#141)

trans-unit.source: Added a built-in objective to assist in applying regularization during training.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个内置目标,以帮助在训练过程中应用正则化。

trans-unit.source: Added a new graph planner algorithm, which can improve simulation speed at the cost of build time
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个新的图形规划器算法,它可以提高模拟速度,但代价是建立时间。

trans-unit.source: Added a warning if users run one-timestep training with a network containing synaptic filters.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户使用包含突触过滤器的网络运行单步训练,则增加了一个警告。

trans-unit.source: Added a warning that changing the TensorFlow seed (e.g. on
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个警告,改变TensorFlow种子(例如在

trans-unit.source: Added ability to manually specify which parts of a model are trainable (see the sim.train documentation)
trans-unit.target: Added ability to manually specify which parts of a model are trainable (see the sim.train documentation)

trans-unit.source: Added an example demonstrating how to train a neural network that can run in spiking neurons
trans-unit.target: Added an example demonstrating how to train a neural network that can run in spiking neurons

trans-unit.source: Added better validation for TensorNode output when
trans-unit.target: 添加了更好的TensorNode输出验证,当

trans-unit.source: Added early termination to graph optimization
trans-unit.target: 为图形优化添加了提前终止功能

trans-unit.source: Added functionality for outputting summary data during the training process that can be viewed in TensorBoard (see the sim.train documentation).
trans-unit.target: Added functionality for outputting summary data during the training process that can be viewed in TensorBoard (see the sim.train documentation).

trans-unit.source: Added more documentation on Simulator arguments
trans-unit.target: 添加了更多关于模拟器参数的文档

trans-unit.source: Added more information to the error message when loading saved parameters that don’t match the current model. (#129)
trans-unit.target: Added more information to the error message when loading saved parameters that don’t match the current model. (#129)

trans-unit.source: Added more informative error message when data is provided with fewer items than
trans-unit.target: 当提供的数据少于项目数时,增加了更多信息性的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Added new methods to simplify the Nengo operation graph, resulting in faster simulation/training speed
trans-unit.target: 增加新的方法来简化Nengo操作图,从而加快模拟/训练速度

trans-unit.source: Added option to disable progress bar in
trans-unit.target: 增加了禁用进度条的选项

trans-unit.source: Added progress bars for the build/simulation process.

trans-unit.source: Added some distributions for weight initialization to
trans-unit.target: 添加了一些用于权重初始化的分布到

trans-unit.target: 添加了一些例子,演示如何在一个更复杂的任务中使用Nengo DL,使用语义指针来编码/检索信息。
增加了对TensorFlow 2.0的支持(预发布)。

trans-unit.source: Added support for UpSampling layers to
Added support for leaky ReLU Keras layers to

Added support for the new Nengo

trans-unit.target: Added tutorial for Nengo users coming to NengoDL

trans-unit.target: Added tutorial for TensorFlow users coming to NengoDL

trans-unit.source: Algorithmic improvements to graph optimization functions
trans-unit.target: 图优化函数的算法改进

trans-unit.source: All previous releases now tracked in documentation
trans-unit.target: 所有以前的版本现在都在文档中跟踪

trans-unit.source: Allow TensorNodes to run in Nengo GUI.
An integer number of steps can now be passed for the
trans-unit.target: 现在可以通过一个整数步数来实现

trans-unit.source: Avoid backpropagating NaN gradients from spiking neurons.
trans-unit.target: 避免从尖峰神经元反传播NaN梯度。

trans-unit.source: Avoid bug in TensorFlow 1.11.0 that prevents certain models from running (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/23383). Note that this doesn’t prevent this from occurring in user models, as we cannot control the model structure there. If your model hangs indefinitely when you call
trans-unit.target: Avoid bug in TensorFlow 1.11.0 that prevents certain models from running (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/23383). Note that this doesn’t prevent this from occurring in user models, as we cannot control the model structure there. If your model hangs indefinitely when you call

trans-unit.source: Avoid reinstalling TensorFlow if one of the nightly build packages is already installed
trans-unit.target: 如果已经安装了一个夜间构建包,避免重新安装TensorFlow。

trans-unit.source: Batch dimension will always be first (if present) when checking model parameters via
trans-unit.target: 当检查模型参数时,批次维度将始终是第一位的(如果存在的话)。

trans-unit.source: Better error message if training data has incorrect rank
trans-unit.target: 如果训练数据的等级不正确,会有更好的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Better handling of Simulator errors not associated with a specific op (fixes #41)
trans-unit.target: Better handling of Simulator errors not associated with a specific op (fixes #41)

trans-unit.source: Configuring whether or not a model element is trainable does not affect whether or not that element is minibatched
trans-unit.target: 配置一个模型元素是否可训练,并不影响该元素是否为迷你配准
通过以下方式建立联系

trans-unit.source: Correctly handle input feeds when n_steps > step_blocks
trans-unit.target: Correctly handle input feeds when n_steps > step_blocks

trans-unit.source: Correctly handle probes that aren’t connected to any ops
trans-unit.target: Correctly handle probes that aren’t connected to any ops

trans-unit.source: Correctly reuse variables created inside a TensorNode when
trans-unit.target: 正确重用在TensorNode内部创建的变量,当
自定义目标函数传递给

trans-unit.source: Details on the unique features of NengoDL

trans-unit.target: 检测换向规划器中的周期

trans-unit.source: Disable INFO-level TensorFlow logging (from C side) on import. Added a NengoDL log message indicating the device the simulation will run on, as a more concise replacement.
trans-unit.target: 在导入时禁用INFO级别的TensorFlow日志(来自C端)。增加了NengoDL日志信息,表明模拟将在哪个设备上运行,作为一个更简洁的替代。

trans-unit.source: Disable TensorFlow 2.0 behaviour (e.g. control flow v2) by default. This will be re-enabled when full TensorFlow 2.0 support is added.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下禁用TensorFlow 2.0行为(例如控制流v2)。当添加完整的TensorFlow 2.0支持时,这将被重新启用。

trans-unit.source: DotInc operators with different signal sizes will no longer be merged (these merged operators had to use a less efficient sparse matrix multiplication, and in general this cost outweighed the benefit of merging).
trans-unit.target: 具有不同信号大小的DotInc运算符将不再合并(这些合并后的运算符不得不使用效率较低的稀疏矩阵乘法,一般来说,这种成本超过了合并的好处)。

trans-unit.source: Eager execution is no longer disabled on import (it is still disabled within the Simulator context, for performance reasons; see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/33052).
trans-unit.target: Eager execution is no longer disabled on import (it is still disabled within the Simulator context, for performance reasons; see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/33052).

trans-unit.source: Ensure that training step is always updated before TensorBoard events are added (previously it could update before or after depending on the platform).
trans-unit.target: 确保训练步骤总是在添加TensorBoard事件之前更新(之前可以根据平台在之前或之后更新)。

trans-unit.source: Extra requirements for documentation/testing are now stored in
trans-unit.target: 额外的文档/测试要求现在存储于

trans-unit.source: Fix bug in uneven step_blocks rounding
trans-unit.target: 修正步骤块四舍五入不均匀的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug related to merging of learning rule with different dimensionality
trans-unit.target: 修正与合并不同维度的学习规则有关的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug when probing slices of certain probeable attributes (those that are directly targeting a Signal in the model). (#164)
trans-unit.target: Fix bug when probing slices of certain probeable attributes (those that are directly targeting a Signal in the model). (#164)

trans-unit.source: Fix bug where passing a built model to the Simulator more than once would result in an error
trans-unit.target: 修复了将一个建立的模型传递给模拟器不止一次会导致错误的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix support for Variables on GPU when
trans-unit.target: 修正对GPU上变量的支持,当

trans-unit.source: Fixed TensorFlow seeding so that randomness can be reliably controlled by setting the Simulator seed.
trans-unit.target: 修正了TensorFlow种子,使随机性可以通过设置模拟器种子得到可靠控制。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where input nodes that were only read as a view were not feedable
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个仅作为视图读取的输入节点不能被馈送的bug

trans-unit.source: Fixed an error that was thrown when calling
Fixed bug due to non-determinism of Process state ordering in Python 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 修正了Python 3.5中Process状态排序非确定性的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in TensorGraph log message when logging was enabled. (#151)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug in TensorGraph log message when logging was enabled. (#151)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in conversion of Keras Dense layers with non-native activation functions. (#144)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug in conversion of Keras Dense layers with non-native activation functions. (#144)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in error message when passing data with batch size less than Simulator minibatch size. (#139)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug in error message when passing data with batch size less than Simulator minibatch size. (#139)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug related to changing the output of a Node after the model is constructed (#4)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug related to changing the output of a Node after the model is constructed (#4)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug related to nodes that had matching output functions but different size_out
trans-unit.target: 修正了与输出函数匹配但size_out不同的节点有关的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug related to probes that do not contain any data yet
trans-unit.target: 修正了与尚未包含任何数据的探针有关的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug when applying the Converter to Keras models that re-use intermediate layers as output layers. (#137)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug when applying the Converter to Keras models that re-use intermediate layers as output layers. (#137)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug when using a TensorNode with a
trans-unit.target: 修正了在使用TensorNode时出现的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where in some cases Nodes with side effects would not be run if their output was not used in the simulation
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个错误,即在某些情况下,如果在模拟中不使用具有副作用的节点的输出,它们将不会被运行。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where non-slot optimizer variables were not initialized (#11)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug where non-slot optimizer variables were not initialized (#11)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where signal order was non-deterministic for Networks containing objects with duplicate names (#9)
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug where signal order was non-deterministic for Networks containing objects with duplicate names (#9)

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where strided reads that cover a full array would be interpreted as non-strided reads of the full array
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个错误,即覆盖整个数组的strided读数会被解释为整个数组的非strided读数。

trans-unit.source: Fixed node outputs changing after simulator is built (fixes #4)
trans-unit.target: Fixed node outputs changing after simulator is built (fixes #4)

trans-unit.source: Fixed objective argument parsing if objective is a callable class or method.
trans-unit.target: 修正了客观参数解析,如果客观是一个可调用的类或方法。
修正了一些边缘情况,如

trans-unit.source: Fixed some broken cross references in the documentation
trans-unit.target: 修正了文档中一些错误的交叉引用

trans-unit.source: Handle Nodes that are not connected to anything else, but are probed (this only occurs in Nengo>=3.1.0). (#159)
trans-unit.target: Handle Nodes that are not connected to anything else, but are probed (this only occurs in Nengo>=3.1.0). (#159)

trans-unit.source: However, NengoDL is not simply a duplicate of the Nengo simulator. It also adds a number of unique features, such as:
trans-unit.target: 然而,NengoDL并不是简单的Nengo模拟器的翻版。它还增加了许多独特的功能,例如:1:

trans-unit.source: If the requested number of simulation steps is not evenly divisible by
trans-unit.target: 如果所要求的模拟步数不是均等地除以

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple target probes given to
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个目标探针给

trans-unit.source: Implemented TensorFlow gradients for sparse Variable update Ops, to allow models with those elements to be trained
trans-unit.target: 实现了稀疏变量更新操作的TensorFlow梯度,允许用这些元素来训练模型。

trans-unit.source: Implemented a modified PES builder in order to avoid slicing encoders on non-decoded PES connections
trans-unit.target: 实现了一个修改后的PES构建器,以避免在非解码的PES连接上使用切片编码器。

trans-unit.source: Implemented sparse matrix multiplication op, to allow more aggressive merging of DotInc operators
trans-unit.target: 实现了稀疏矩阵乘法运算,允许更积极地合并DotInc运算符。

trans-unit.source: Improve build speed of models with large constants (#69)
trans-unit.target: Improve build speed of models with large constants (#69)

trans-unit.source: Improved build time of networks containing lots of
trans-unit.target: 改善了包含大量网络的构建时间
提高实施生态系统服务补偿方案的效率

trans-unit.source: Improved efficiency of stateful gradient operations, resulting in faster training speed
trans-unit.target: 提高有状态梯度操作的效率,从而加快训练速度。

trans-unit.source: Improved efficiency of tree_planner, made it the new default planner
trans-unit.target: 提高了 tree_planner 的效率,使其成为新的默认规划器。

trans-unit.source: Improved error checking for input/target data
trans-unit.target: 改进输入/目标数据的错误检查
改进图形优化器的内存组织

trans-unit.source: Improved memory usage of build process. (#119)
trans-unit.target: Improved memory usage of build process. (#119)

trans-unit.source: Improved speed of PES implementation by adding a custom operator.
trans-unit.target: 通过增加一个自定义运算符,提高了PES的执行速度。

trans-unit.source: Improved speed of parameter fetching though
trans-unit.target: 提高了参数获取的速度

trans-unit.source: In practice, what that means is that the code for constructing a Nengo model is exactly the same as it would be for the standard Nengo simulator. All that changes is that we use a different Simulator class to execute the model.
trans-unit.target: 实际上,这意味着构建Nengo模型的代码与标准Nengo模拟器的代码完全相同。唯一的变化是我们使用不同的模拟器类来执行模型。

trans-unit.source: Increased minimum Nengo core version to 3.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 将Nengo核心版本最小值提高到3.0.0。

trans-unit.source: Increased minimum NumPy version to 1.12.1 (required by TensorFlow)
trans-unit.target: 将NumPy的最低版本提高到1.12.1(TensorFlow要求)。

trans-unit.source: Increased minimum numpy version to 1.14.5 (required by TensorFlow 1.14).
trans-unit.target: 将最小numpy版本增加到1.14.5(TensorFlow 1.14要求)。

trans-unit.source: Keras Layers inside TensorNodes will be called with the
trans-unit.target: TensorNodes内部的Keras Layers将被调用与

trans-unit.source: Low-level simulation input/output formats have been reworked to make them slightly easier to use (for users who want to bypass
trans-unit.target: 低级模拟输入/输出格式已被重新设计,使它们更容易使用(对于想要绕过

trans-unit.source: Lowpass synapse can now be applied to multidimensional inputs
trans-unit.target: 低通突触现在可以应用于多维输入

trans-unit.source: Minimum Numpy version is now 1.16.0 (required by TensorFlow). (#119)
trans-unit.target: Minimum Numpy version is now 1.16.0 (required by TensorFlow). (#119)

trans-unit.source: Minor efficiency improvements to graph planner
trans-unit.target: 小幅提高图形规划器的效率

trans-unit.source: Minor improvements to efficiency of build process.
trans-unit.target: 小幅提高建设过程的效率。

trans-unit.source: Minor improvements to simulation efficiency targeting small ops (
trans-unit.target: 小幅提高针对小型行动的模拟效率(

trans-unit.source: Model parameters (e.g., connection weights) that are not trainable (because they’ve been marked non-trainable by user or targeted by an online learning rule) will now be treated separately from simulator state. For example,
trans-unit.target: Model parameters (e.g., connection weights) that are not trainable (because they’ve been marked non-trainable by user or targeted by an online learning rule) will now be treated separately from simulator state. For example,

trans-unit.source: More efficient implementation of convolutional biases in the Converter. (#130)
trans-unit.target: More efficient implementation of convolutional biases in the Converter. (#130)

trans-unit.source: More informative error message if the user tries to pass target values for a probe that isn’t used in the objective function.
trans-unit.target: More informative error message if the user tries to pass target values for a probe that isn’t used in the objective function.
更多信息的错误信息,当

trans-unit.source: More informative error messages when accessing invalid Simulator functionality after the Simulator has been closed. (#139)
trans-unit.target: More informative error messages when accessing invalid Simulator functionality after the Simulator has been closed. (#139)

trans-unit.source: More robust support for converting nested Keras models in TensorFlow 2.3. (#161)
trans-unit.target: More robust support for converting nested Keras models in TensorFlow 2.3. (#161)

trans-unit.source: Moved op-specific merge logic into the
trans-unit.target: 将特定操作的合并逻辑移至

trans-unit.source: NengoDL is a simulator for Nengo models. That means it takes a Nengo network as input, and allows the user to simulate that network using some underlying computational framework (in this case, TensorFlow).
trans-unit.target: NengoDL is a simulator for Nengo models. That means it takes a Nengo network as input, and allows the user to simulate that network using some underlying computational framework (in this case, TensorFlow).

trans-unit.source: NengoDL no longer supports Python 2 (see https://python3statement.org/ for more information)
trans-unit.target: NengoDL no longer supports Python 2 (see https://python3statement.org/ for more information)

trans-unit.source: NengoDL no longer supports Python 3.4 (official support for 3.4 ended in March 2019).
trans-unit.target: NengoDL不再支持Python 3.4(官方对3.4的支持在2019年3月结束)。

trans-unit.source: NengoDL will disable eager execution on import (and will probably not work properly if it is manually re-enabled).
trans-unit.target: NengoDL会在导入时禁止急切执行(如果手动重新启用,可能无法正常工作)。

trans-unit.source: NengoDL will no longer monkeypatch fix the
trans-unit.target: NengoDL将不再对猴子补丁进行修复。

trans-unit.source: NengoDL will now automatically use a rate-based approximation to compute the gradient for spiking neuron types, if one is known (no more need to manually swap neuron types for training and inference).
trans-unit.target: NengoDL现在会自动使用基于速率的近似值来计算尖峰神经元类型的梯度,如果已知的话(不再需要手动交换神经元类型进行训练和推理)。

trans-unit.source: NengoDL will now default to allowing TensorFlow’s “soft placement” logic, meaning that even if you specify an explicit device like
trans-unit.target: NengoDL will now default to allowing TensorFlow’s “soft placement” logic, meaning that even if you specify an explicit device like

trans-unit.source: NengoDL will now use TensorFlow’s “control flow v2” by default. The previous behaviour can be restored by calling
trans-unit.target: NengoDL will now use TensorFlow’s “control flow v2” by default. The previous behaviour can be restored by calling

trans-unit.source: NengoDL will now use TensorFlow’s eager mode by default. The previous graph-mode behaviour can be restored by calling
trans-unit.target: NengoDL will now use TensorFlow’s eager mode by default. The previous graph-mode behaviour can be restored by calling

trans-unit.source: Nested Keras layers passed to TensorNode will be rebuilt correctly if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要的话,传递给TensorNode的嵌套Keras层将被正确重建。

trans-unit.source: Optimizer variables (e.g., momentum values) will only be initialized the first time that optimizer is passed to
trans-unit.target: 优化器变量(如动量值)只有在第一次将优化器传递给

trans-unit.source: Order of variable creation is now deterministic (helps make saving/loading parameters more reliable)
trans-unit.target: 变量创建的顺序现在是确定的(有助于使保存/加载参数更加可靠)。
将未知的配置选项传递给

trans-unit.source: Process inputs are now reseeded for each input when batch processing (if seed is not manually set).
trans-unit.target: 现在,在批量处理时,对每一个输入的过程输入都会重新设置(如果没有手动设置种子)。

trans-unit.source: Provide a more informative error message if Layer
trans-unit.target: 在层的情况下,提供更丰富的错误信息

trans-unit.source: Raise a more informative error if user attempts to pickle a Simulator (this is not possible to do with TensorFlow sessions; see the documentation for other methods of saving/loading a NengoDL model).
trans-unit.target: Raise a more informative error if user attempts to pickle a Simulator (this is not possible to do with TensorFlow sessions; see the documentation for other methods of saving/loading a NengoDL model).

trans-unit.source: Raise a warning if user tries to train a network with non-differentiable elements (requires
trans-unit.target: 如果用户试图用不可区分的元素来训练网络,就会发出警告(需要用到

trans-unit.source: Reduce memory usage during training by caching temporary variables used when computing
trans-unit.target: 通过缓存计算时使用的临时变量,减少训练期间的内存使用量。

trans-unit.source: Reduced size of TensorFlow constants created by Reset ops.
trans-unit.target: 缩小了由Reset ops创建的TensorFlow常量的大小。

trans-unit.source: Reduced the amount of state that needs to be stored in the simulation. (#129)
trans-unit.target: Reduced the amount of state that needs to be stored in the simulation. (#129)

trans-unit.source: Removed the session_config configuration option. Use the updated TensorFlow config system instead.
trans-unit.target: Removed the session_config configuration option. Use the updated TensorFlow config system instead.

trans-unit.source: Reorganized documentation into “User guide” and “API reference” sections.
trans-unit.target: Reorganized documentation into “User guide” and “API reference” sections.

trans-unit.source: Reorganized documentation to more clearly direct new users to relevant material
trans-unit.target: 重组文件,以更清楚地引导新用户查阅相关材料。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the simulator now only rebuilds the necessary components in the graph (as opposed to rebuilding the whole graph)
trans-unit.target: 重置模拟器现在只重建图形中的必要组件(而不是重建整个图形)。

trans-unit.source: Saved simulation state may now be placed on GPU (this should improve the speed of state updates, but may slightly increase GPU memory usage). (#119)
trans-unit.target: Saved simulation state may now be placed on GPU (this should improve the speed of state updates, but may slightly increase GPU memory usage). (#119)

trans-unit.source: Saved simulator state will no longer be included in
trans-unit.target: 保存的模拟器状态将不再包括在

trans-unit.source: SimPyFunc operators will always be assigned to CPU, even when
trans-unit.target: SimPyFunc运算符总是被分配给CPU,即使是在

trans-unit.source: Simulator seed will now be deterministic for a given top-level Network seed.
trans-unit.target: 对于给定的顶层网络种子,模拟器种子现在将是确定性的。

trans-unit.source: Sort write signals as well as reads during graph optimization (encourages tighter partitioning, which can improve training/inference speed).
trans-unit.target: 在图优化过程中对写信号以及读信号进行排序(鼓励更紧密的分区,这可以提高训练/推理速度)。

trans-unit.source: Standardized all signals/operations in a simulation to be batch-first.
trans-unit.target: 将模拟中的所有信号/操作标准化为批量优先。

trans-unit.source: Switched to ADD_N gradient accumulation (from TREE); this will increase the memory usage during training, but improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 改为ADD_N梯度累积(从TREE);这将增加训练期间的内存使用量,但提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Switched to nengo-bones templating system for TravisCI config/scripts.
trans-unit.target: TravisCI配置/脚本改用nengo-bones模板系统。

trans-unit.source: Temporary patch to fix memory leak in TensorFlow (see #11273)
trans-unit.target: Temporary patch to fix memory leak in TensorFlow (see #11273)

trans-unit.source: TensorBoard output directory will be automatically created if it doesn’t exist
trans-unit.target: TensorBoard output directory will be automatically created if it doesn’t exist

trans-unit.source: TensorFlow INFO-level log messages are now disabled by default on import
trans-unit.target: TensorFlow INFO级别的日志消息现在在导入时默认为禁用。

trans-unit.source: TensorFlow ops created within the Simulator context will now default to the same device as the Simulator.
trans-unit.target: 在模拟器上下文中创建的TensorFlow操作现在将默认为与模拟器相同的设备。

trans-unit.source: TensorFlow session config options can now be set using
trans-unit.target: TensorFlow会话配置选项现在可以通过使用

trans-unit.source: TensorFlow’s “control flow v2” is disabled on import, for performance reasons; see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/33052.
trans-unit.target: TensorFlow’s “control flow v2” is disabled on import, for performance reasons; see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/33052.

trans-unit.source: TensorNode outputs can now define a
trans-unit.target: TensorNode输出现在可以定义一个

trans-unit.source: TensorNodes will no longer be built into the default graph when checking their output dimensionality.
trans-unit.target: 在检查其输出维度时,TensorNodes将不再被内置到默认图中。

trans-unit.source: Test Simulator parameters are now controlled through pytest arguments, rather than environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 测试模拟器参数现在可以通过 pytest 参数控制,而不是环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The dtype option is now specified as a string (e.g.
trans-unit.target: The dtype option is now specified as a string (e.g.

trans-unit.source: The remove_constant_copies simplification step is now disabled by default. In certain situations this could be an unsafe manipulation (specifically, when using
trans-unit.target: The remove_constant_copies simplification step is now disabled by default. In certain situations this could be an unsafe manipulation (specifically, when using

trans-unit.source: The Simulator context will now also set the default TensorFlow graph to the one associated with the Simulator (so any TensorFlow ops created within the Simulator context will automatically be added to the correct graph)
trans-unit.target: 模拟器上下文现在也会将默认的TensorFlow图设置为与模拟器相关联的图(因此在模拟器上下文中创建的任何TensorFlow操作都会自动添加到正确的图中)。

trans-unit.source: The Spaun benchmark network will now be installed through pip rather than manually cloning and importing the repo.
trans-unit.target: Spaun基准网络现在将通过pip安装,而不是手动克隆和导入repo。

trans-unit.source: The default TensorFlow Session is now set to the underlying Simulator session within the Simulator context.
trans-unit.target: 默认的TensorFlow会话现在被设置为模拟器上下文中的底层模拟器会话。

trans-unit.source: The default graph planner can now be modified by setting the
trans-unit.target: 默认的图形规划器现在可以通过设置

trans-unit.source: The default session will now be set to the NengoDL session before calling TensorNodes’
trans-unit.target: The default session will now be set to the NengoDL session before calling TensorNodes’

trans-unit.source: The motivation for this change is that not all objective functions require target values. Switching to the more generic
trans-unit.target: 这一改变的动机是,并非所有的目标函数都需要目标值。改用更通用的

trans-unit.source: The motivation for this change is that, especially with the other new features introduced in the 2.0 update, there were a lot of different ways to specify the
trans-unit.target: 这个变化的动机是,特别是在2.0更新中引入的其他新功能,有很多不同的方法来指定的。

trans-unit.source: The precision of the Nengo core build process will now be set based on the
trans-unit.target: 现在,Nengo核心构建过程的精度将基于以下几点进行设置

trans-unit.source: The signal sorting/graph simplificaton functions can now be configured through
trans-unit.target: 现在可以通过以下方式配置信号排序/图形简化功能。

trans-unit.source: The training/inference build logic (e.g., swapping spiking neurons with rate implementations) can be overridden by setting the global Keras learning phase (
trans-unit.target: 训练/推理构建逻辑(例如,用速率实现交换尖峰神经元)可以通过设置全局Keras学习阶段(

trans-unit.source: There are a lot of breaking changes in NengoDL 3.0. See the migration guide for all the details.
trans-unit.target: There are a lot of breaking changes in NengoDL 3.0. See the migration guide for all the details.

trans-unit.source: Trainability can now be configured in the config of subnetworks. This replaces the ability to mark Networks as (non)trainable. See the updated documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: Trainability can now be configured in the config of subnetworks. This replaces the ability to mark Networks as (non)trainable. See the updated documentation for details.

trans-unit.source: Training/evaluation target data can now have a different number of timesteps than input data (as long as it aligns with the number of timesteps expected by the loss function).
trans-unit.target: 训练/评估目标数据现在可以拥有与输入数据不同的时间步长(只要它与损失函数预期的时间步长一致)。

trans-unit.source: Tutorial for new users with a Nengo background
trans-unit.target: 为有Nengo背景的新用户提供的教程

trans-unit.source: Tutorial for new users with a TensorFlow background
Update LinearFilter synapse implementation to match recent changes in Nengo core (see https://github.com/nengo/nengo/pull/1535).
trans-unit.target: Update LinearFilter synapse implementation to match recent changes in Nengo core (see https://github.com/nengo/nengo/pull/1535).

trans-unit.source: Update testing framework to use new nengo pytest ecosystem (
trans-unit.target: 更新测试框架以使用新的 nengo pytest 生态系统(

trans-unit.source: Updated PES implementation to work with generic synapse types (see https://github.com/nengo/nengo/pull/1095)
trans-unit.target: Updated PES implementation to work with generic synapse types (see https://github.com/nengo/nengo/pull/1095)

trans-unit.source: Updated TensorFlow installation instruction in documentation. (#170)
trans-unit.target: Updated TensorFlow installation instruction in documentation. (#170)

trans-unit.source: Updated TensorFuncParam to new Nengo Param syntax
trans-unit.target: 更新 TensorFuncParam 为新的 Nengo Param 语法。

trans-unit.source: Updated all documentation and examples for the new syntax (in particular, see the updated Coming from TensorFlow tutorial and TensorFlow/Keras integration example, and the new Tips and tricks page).
trans-unit.target: Updated all documentation and examples for the new syntax (in particular, see the updated Coming from TensorFlow tutorial and TensorFlow/Keras integration example, and the new Tips and tricks page).

trans-unit.source: Updated progress bar to work with
Updated spiking MNIST example to simplify and improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 更新了尖峰MNIST示例,以简化和提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Updated the KerasWrapper class in the

trans-unit.target: 使用记录器进行调试/生成器输出。

trans-unit.source: Use sparse Variable updates for signals.scatter/gather
Use tf.Session instead of tf.InteractiveSession, to avoid strange side effects if the simulator isn’t closed properly
trans-unit.target: Use tf.Session instead of tf.InteractiveSession, to avoid strange side effects if the simulator isn’t closed properly

trans-unit.source: Use the new tf.profiler tool to collect profiling data in
trans-unit.target: Use the new tf.profiler tool to collect profiling data in

trans-unit.source: User can now directly specify the output error gradient, rather than using targets/objective (useful for when you have some external process for computing error that is not easy to implement as an objective function). See the documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: User can now directly specify the output error gradient, rather than using targets/objective (useful for when you have some external process for computing error that is not easy to implement as an objective function). See the documentation for details.

trans-unit.source: Users can now specify a different objective for each output probe during training/loss calculation (see the sim.train documentation).
trans-unit.target: Users can now specify a different objective for each output probe during training/loss calculation (see the sim.train documentation).

trans-unit.source: Users can pass a dict of config options for the
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过一个dict的配置选项来为

and access the TensorFlow session directly).
applied to an Ensemble with Direct neurons

are now managed as part of the op graph, rather than manually in the Simulator.

Making the argument explicit helps clarify the mental model.

This made it somewhat unclear how exactly this argument worked, and the automatic “broadcasting” was also ambiguous (e.g., should the single objective be applied to each probe individually, or to all of them together?). Making the argument explicit helps clarify the mental model.

trans-unit.source: gradients on import. The gradients are still incorrect (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7397), but we no longer use this operation within NengoDL so we leave it up to the user to fix it in their own code if needed.
trans-unit.target: gradients on import. The gradients are still incorrect (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7397), but we no longer use this operation within NengoDL so we leave it up to the user to fix it in their own code if needed.

trans-unit.source: layers that can be used as input to the TensorGraph layer itself.
trans-unit.target: 层,可以作为TensorGraph层本身的输入。

trans-unit.source: loss implementation will now automatically convert
trans-unit.target: 损失的实现现在将自动转换

trans-unit.source: must now be explicitly specified as

trans-unit.target: 神经元类型现在有一个

trans-unit.source: no longer prints any information to stdout in TensorFlow 2.2 in graph mode (due to a TensorFlow issue, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/39456). Loss/metric values will still be returned from the function as normal. (#153)
trans-unit.target: no longer prints any information to stdout in TensorFlow 2.2 in graph mode (due to a TensorFlow issue, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/39456). Loss/metric values will still be returned from the function as normal. (#153)

trans-unit.source: no longer resets the internal state of the simulation (so they can be safely intermixed with calls to
trans-unit.target: 不再重置模拟的内部状态(所以它们可以安全地与对

trans-unit.source: now defaults to the value of
now only accepts an optional list of Probes (no longer accepts arbitrary Tensors).
trans-unit.target: 现在只接受一个可选的Probes列表(不再接受任意的Tensors)。

trans-unit.source: now passes any extra kwargs to the

now uses the TensorBoard format when profiling, see the documentation for instructions on how to view this information (the information is the same, it is just accessed through TensorBoard rather than requiring that it be loaded directly in a Chrome browser).
trans-unit.target: now uses the TensorBoard format when profiling, see the documentation for instructions on how to view this information (the information is the same, it is just accessed through TensorBoard rather than requiring that it be loaded directly in a Chrome browser).

trans-unit.source: on Probes if only the data from the most recent simulation step is desired (as opposed to the default behaviour of keeping the data from all steps).
trans-unit.target: 如果只需要从最近的模拟步骤中获取数据,则可以在 "探针 "上使用(与保留所有步骤数据的默认行为相反)。

trans-unit.source: optimizing the parameters of a model through deep learning training methods (using the Keras API)
trans-unit.target: 通过深度学习训练方法优化模型的参数(使用Keras API)。

trans-unit.source: option to avoid building the parts of the model responsible for preserving state between executions (this will override any
trans-unit.target: 选项,以避免构建模型中负责在执行之间保存状态的部分(这将覆盖任何的

trans-unit.source: option to avoid building the simulation inside a symbolic TensorFlow loop. This may improve simulation speed, but the simulation can only run for exactly
trans-unit.target: 选项,以避免在一个符号化的 TensorFlow 循环内构建模拟。这可能会提高仿真速度,但仿真只能准确地运行于

trans-unit.source: option to collect profiling information during training
trans-unit.target: 在培训期间收集特征信息的选项

trans-unit.source: option to disable the progress information printed to console when the network is building.
trans-unit.target: 选项,以禁用网络建设时打印到控制台的进度信息。

trans-unit.source: option to the Converter, which will allow some Layers/parameters that cannot be fully converted to native Nengo objects to be converted in a way that only matches the inference behaviour of the source Keras model (not the training behaviour). (#119)
trans-unit.target: option to the Converter, which will allow some Layers/parameters that cannot be fully converted to native Nengo objects to be converted in a way that only matches the inference behaviour of the source Keras model (not the training behaviour). (#119)

trans-unit.source: option, which will build the network in inference-only mode. This will slightly improve the inference speed of the simulation, but the network will not be trainable.
trans-unit.target: 选项,它将以纯推理模式建立网络。这将略微提高模拟的推理速度,但网络将无法训练。

trans-unit.source: option, which will control how much smoothing is applied to the LIF function during gradient calculations (if any).
trans-unit.target: 选项,该选项将控制梯度计算过程中对LIF函数的平滑程度(如果有的话)。

to control whether the loss is evaluated in training or inference mode.

trans-unit.target: weights on non-Ensemble connections will no longer be present. (#128)

trans-unit.source: which can be set to False to avoid updating the saved simulation state at the end of a run.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置为 "假",以避免在运行结束时更新保存的模拟状态。

trans-unit.source: will be updated based on the number of steps actually run (rather than the requested number of steps). Note that these extra steps were also run previously, but their results were hidden from the user.
trans-unit.target: 将根据实际运行的步骤数(而不是请求的步骤数)进行更新。请注意,这些额外的步骤之前也运行过,但其结果对用户是隐藏的。

trans-unit.source: will be marked as non-trainable by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,将被标记为不可培训。

trans-unit.source: will be truncated if not evenly divisible by the specified minibatch size
trans-unit.target: 如果没有被指定的最小批量大小平均分割,将被截断。

trans-unit.source: will not include the saved simulator state, making it easier to reuse weights between models (as long as the models have the same weights, they do not need to have the same state variables).
trans-unit.target: 将不包括保存的模拟器状态,使得模型之间更容易重用权重(只要模型有相同的权重,它们不需要有相同的状态变量)。

trans-unit.source: will now give a more explicit error message.
trans-unit.target: 现在会给出一个更明确的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: will now return live parameter values from the simulation, rather than initial values from the build process. That means that it can be used to get the values of object parameters after training, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 现在将从模拟中返回实时参数值,而不是构建过程中的初始值。这意味着,它可以在训练后获得对象参数的值,如

trans-unit.source: will resume with the values from the previous call.
trans-unit.target: 将恢复上一次调用的值。

trans-unit.source: will still include those parameters, and the results of any online learning will persist between calls even with
trans-unit.target: 将仍然包括这些参数,任何在线学习的结果将在两次调用之间持续存在,即使是用
